title: Chapter II - Agents, Brokers And Adjusters
content:
Chapter II - Agents, Brokers And Adjusters

State Regulations

Part 20 - Brokers, agents and certain other licensees - general (§ 20.1 to 20.7)

Part 21 - Insurance Brokers And Excess Line Brokers (§ 21.1 to 21.4)

Part 22 - Agents: Life, Accident And Health (§ 22.1 to 22.3)

Part 23 - Agents: Fire, Marine, Casualty, Etc (§ 23.1 to 23.5)

Part 24 - Officers And Employees Of Insurers (§ 24.1 to 24.3)

Part 25 - Public Adjusters (§ 25.1 to 25.13)

Part 26 - Independent Adjusters (§ 26.1 to 26.7)

Part 27 - Excess Line Placements Governing Standards (§ 27.0 to 27.24)

Part 28 - Professional Bail Bond Agents (§ 28.0 to 28.20)

Part 29 - Special Prohibitions (§ 29.1 to 29.6)

Part 30 - Producer Compensation Transparency (§ 30.1 to 30.7)

Part 31 - Summary Suspension Of Insurance Law Licenses (§ 31.1 to 31.2)

Part 32 - Reinsurance Intermediaries (§ 32.0 to 32.4)

Part 33 - Managing General Agents (§ 33.0 to 33.6)

Part 34 - Requirements Pertaining To The Location Of An Insurance Agent Or Broker At Each Place Of Insurance Business: Reporting Requirements (§ 34.0 to 34.5)

Part 35 - Title Insurance: Title Insurance Agents, Aflliated Relationships, And Required Disclosures (§ 35.1 to 35.9)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
